char_info.char_desc: The Queen of the Yao Tribe

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm glad to see you again because look at what you did to me.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Now I'm going to target your shiny bald head with my magnificent Master Spark.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: The spell may still be in effect, but my hair won't grow back.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm going to stop you and your madness this time.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You won't dance anymore without your hair. I took it off!

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You told me to leave after your defeat, but I won't leave now!

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: For God's sake, can you just please back off?

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Why won't you let me stay? This is my revenge plot!

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: This is it. This has become totally outrageous and you're going to be punished for this disgrace.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I will make you into another bald fool who will object to your peoples' orders!
